text: Peg + Cat is an American-Canadian animated children's television series based on the children's book The Chicken Problem, which was published in 2020. The series is created by Billy Aronson and Jennifer Oxley. The series focuses on a young girl named Peg and her talking pet cat, named Cat. The show teaches the viewer math. Peg and Cat's adventures often relate to math. Peg speaks directly to the viewers and encourages them to follow along with the episode's plot. It started on most PBS Kids stations on November 18, 2013. It has a voice cast which includes Hayley Faith Negrin, Dwayne Hill, Annick Obonsawin and Thamela Mpumlwana. In June 2016, the spin-off of Peg + Cat, titled Hard Stuff with Frances Jackson was to be announced. The spin-off premiered on October 11, 2017. == References == Category:American children's television series Category:2013 American television series debuts Category:2018 American television series endings Category:2018 Canadian television series endings
title: Peg + Cat
